_comments: Browscap-php v6 and v7 are NOT backwards compatible, so needs to test.
Monolog upgrade from 1.25.3 to 2.5 or 3 is also to be tested
Doctrine simple cache no longer supported, switched to scrapbook

suggest.ext-openssl: Enabling the openssl extension allows you to access HTTPS URLs
suggest.ext-redis: For working background jobs and feed and warninglist caches
suggest.ext-zip: Enabling processing feeds that are ZIP compressed
suggest.ext-zlib: Allow gzip compression of HTTP responses
suggest.ext-brotli: Allow brotli compression of HTTP responses and audit logs
suggest.ext-zstd: For better and faster compression when fetching data from remote servers
suggest.ext-rdkafka: Required for publishing events to Kafka broker
suggest.ext-apcu: To cache data in memory instead of file system
suggest.ext-curl: For faster fetching data from remote servers and feeds
suggest.iglocska/cake-resque: If you would like to use the old background worker system install this. But this is advised against.
